summary: The class provides a dataset abstraction that loads raw CNN/DailyMail news files from a given directory, parses each file to separate the main article text from its summary highlights (identified by the '@highlight' marker), and presents the paired content as items suitable for sequence‑to‑sequence model training.
business_intent: To streamline the creation of high‑quality training data for text‑summarization models, allowing developers and data scientists to quickly integrate the CNN/DailyMail corpus into their machine‑learning pipelines without manual preprocessing.
